lead_paragraph: The former Lexington County sheriff, James Metts, 68, had been the county’s top lawman for more than four decades when he was indicted last year on 10 charges.

headline.print_headline: South Carolina: Ex-sheriff Sentenced To Year In Prison
headline.main: South Carolina: Ex-sheriff Sentenced to Year in Prison

snippet: The former Lexington County sheriff, James Metts, 68, had been the county’s top lawman for more than four decades when he was indicted last year on 10 charges.
